tokens.text: analyzes world data including chunks and command blocks

title: World Data
description: Analyzes world data including LevelDB chunks, command blocks, level.dat settings, and coordinates. Identifies command usage patterns and potential issues in saved world data.

fields.title: Function Command
fields.description: Warning when a potentially problematic command is found in an MCFunction file. Some commands may have unintended effects in certain contexts.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the problematic command text

fields.title: Block Command
fields.description: Warning when a potentially problematic command is found in a command block. Some commands may cause issues when run from command blocks.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the command block command text

fields.title: Min X
fields.description: The minimum X coordinate of loaded chunks in the world. Used to determine world boundaries.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the minimum X coordinate as a number

fields.title: Min Z
fields.description: The minimum Z coordinate of loaded chunks in the world. Used to determine world boundaries.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the minimum Z coordinate as a number

fields.title: Max X
fields.description: The maximum X coordinate of loaded chunks in the world. Used to determine world boundaries.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the maximum X coordinate as a number

fields.title: Max Z
fields.description: The maximum Z coordinate of loaded chunks in the world. Used to determine world boundaries.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the maximum Z coordinate as a number

fields.title: World Command
fields.description: Warning when commands that affect the entire world are detected, such as weather, time, or gamerule commands.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the world-impacting command text

fields.title: Block Types
fields.description: Tracks block types found in the world data for content analysis.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the block type identifier

fields.title: Block States
fields.description: Tracks block data values and states found in the world.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the block state data

fields.title: Command
fields.description: Tracks individual commands found in the world (from command blocks, etc.) for analysis.

fields.title: Execute Subcommand
fields.description: Tracks subcommands used within /execute commands for complexity analysis.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the execute subcommand text

fields.title: Level.dat Info
fields.description: Information extracted from the level.dat file, including world settings and properties.

fields.title: Experiments
fields.description: Experiments enabled in the world's level.dat file.

fields.title: Empty Chunks
fields.description: Count of chunks that have no subchunk data. May indicate empty or corrupted chunks.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count of empty chunks

fields.title: Chunk Count
fields.description: Total number of chunks in the world.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the total chunk count

fields.title: Outdated Command
fields.description: Warning when a command uses syntax from an older Minecraft version. Consider updating to current command syntax.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the outdated command text

fields.title: Processing Error
fields.description: Error when the world data could not be fully processed. May indicate corruption or unsupported format.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains details about the processing error

fields.title: Unexpected Error
fields.description: An unexpected error occurred while processing world data. Check logs for details.
